1278:4163: pṛthagjanā yadvadanti ghaṭa iti pudgala iti|
1278:4165: śaikṣā ātmadṛṣṭivihīnā api samyaksmṛtipramoṣat pañcasu skandheṣu asmimānalakṣaṇena vadanti-ayaṃ pudgalaḥ ayaṃ ghaṭa iti|

1278:4175: bhagavān dharmāṇāṃ tattvalakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī vineyasattvānanusṛtya vividhaṃ nāma sthāpayati|
1278:4178: api cāha anityādisaṃjñā bhāvitā sarvān kleśān paribhedayatīti|
1278:4179: āha ca-caturthamakṛṣṇamaśuklaṃ karma sarvakarmāṇi śaikṣacetanākhyāni kṣapayatīti|
1278:4189: vaktavyā ca dvividhā saṃjñā lokaṃ pratītya satyaṃ,
1278:4193: kācit mohakāṣṭhātmikā saṃjñā yāvat laukikakuśalākuśalāni na vijānāti|
1278:4197: itīyaṃ saṃjñā skandhalakṣaṇaparibhedakaṃ jñānamanukūlayatītyato bhagavānupadiśati jñānamiti|
1278:4198: iyañca saṃjñā tattvajñānasya hetuṃ karotītyato jñānami tyucyate|
1278:4205: saptāsravasūtre ca vacanaprahāṇavṛttiprahāṇādaya āsravahetava āsravā ityucyante|
1278:4212: (pṛ) smṛtyupasthāneṣu uṣmādiṣu ca gataṃ cittaṃ tattvadharmamālambate|
1278:4215: ato yatra prajñaptividhamanaṃ cittaṃ tadanu samāgataṃ cittamanāsravaṃ bhavati|
1278:4221: anātmasaṃjñayā cittaṃ bhāvayatāṃ kṣipraṃ rāgadveṣamohebhyo vimucyate ityādi|
1278:4223: anātmasaṃjñayā hi cittaṃ bhāvayatāṃ duḥkhasaṃjñā pratitiṣṭhati|
1278:4233: (u) sūtra uktam-anityasaṃjñābhāvitaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ cittamanātmasaṃjñāyāṃ pratitiṣṭhati iti|
1278:4238: ataḥ pañcaskandhā anityā iti paśyan anātmāna iti prajānāti|
1278:4243: ātmā ma utpadyate vyeti cetyasyāgataṃ bhavati| iti|
1278:4261: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā vāśījaṭopamasūtre-jānataḥ paśyata āsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ vadāmi|
1278:4262: kiṃ jānataḥ kiṃ paśyata āsravāṇāṃ kṣayo bhavati|
1278:4269: evameva bhāvanānuyogamanuyuktasya bhikṣornaivaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati etāvatko bata me'dyāsravāṇāṃ kṣīṇam|
1278:4271: atha khalvasya kṣīṇe kṣīṇānta eva jñānaṃ bhavati|
1278:4276: ato jñāyate smṛtyupasthānādigato mārgāṅgabhāvanānuyogamanuktaḥ strotaāpattiphalapratipannaka iti|
1278:4277: yadyekasmin kṣaṇe yadi vā pañcadaśasu kṣaṇeṣu na bhāvanānuyogaṃ vindate|
1278:4281: iti vedanā iti jñānamiti prathamamuktamādyaphalasya mārgaḥ|
1278:4291: ataḥ smṛtyupasthānādau pūtibhūtaḥ san pṛthagjano bhavati|
1278:4295: ato jñāyate smṛtyupasthānādigataḥ viprakṛṣṭaḥ pratipannaka ityucyate|
1278:4296: kiñcogreṇa saṅghe nimantrite devatā upasaṅkramya ārocayanti-amuko gṛhapate arhan yāvadamuka ādyaphalapratipannaka iti|
1278:4300: kiñcoktaṃ bhagavatā sūtre-yasya [khalu bhikṣava imāni] pañcendriyāṇi (śraddhādīni) na santi|
1278:4301: tamahaṃ bāhyaḥ pṛthagjanapakṣe sthita iti vadāmīti|
1278:4306: ayamābhyantaraḥ pṛthagjana ārya ityupyucyate pṛthagjana ityapyucyate|
1278:4315: atha ca [tatra] channasya [cittaṃ] na dharmaniyāme praskandati|
1278:4320: (u) yo nirodhaṃ paśyati sa tattvataḥ pratipannakaḥ|

1278:4325: yathoktaṃ sūtre-bhikṣavo bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti-kathaṃ dharmaṃ paśyema iti|

1278:4338: yadasmin dharme cittaṃ praskandati adhimucyate neñjate na parāvartate na śocate na paritrāsate|
1278:4340: ato jñāyate yogī anityādyākāraiḥ pañcaskandhānavalokayan viprakṛṣṭaḥ pratipannaka ityucyate|
1278:4341: teṣāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyan sannikṛṣṭaḥ pratipannaka iti|

1278:4355: yastīkṣṇaprajñayā kṣāntiṃ śraddadhate sa dharmā[nusārī] pratipannakaḥ|
1278:4358: ato jñāyate nirodhaṃ paśyan sannikṛṣṭaḥ pratipannako bhavatīti|
1278:4364: bhagavān dvādaśanidānānāṃ nirodhaṃ dṛṣṭvā anuttaramabhisambuddho'bhūt iti|
1278:4365: dharmamudrāyāñcoktam-pañcaskandhānanityān vipralopān mṛṣābhūtānasārān śūnyāṃśca paśyato yogino jñānadarśanamaviśuddhaṃ bhavati iti|
1278:4366: sūtramidamanta āha-yogina evaṃ bhavati-yanmayā dṛśyate śrūyate ājighryate rasyate spṛśyate manyate tat sarvaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ vijñānam|
1278:4367: yadasya vijñānasya hetupratyayā nityā vā anityā vā iti|
1278:4369: anityebhyo hetupratyayebhya utpannaṃ vijñānaṃ kathaṃ nityaṃ bhavet|
1278:4370: ataḥ sarve pañcaskandhā anityāḥ pratītyasamutpannāḥ kṣayalakṣaṇāḥ vipariṇāmalakṣaṇā viyogalakṣaṇā nirodhalakṣaṇā iti paśyati|
1278:4381: sūtre hi bhagavatoktam-caturṇāmaryasatyānāṃ yathābhūtamananubodhāt evamidaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ [sandhāvitaṃ] saṃsaritaṃ mama ca yuṣmākañca idānīmimāni catvāri satyānyanubaddhāni|
1278:4389: āha ca-ye hi kecit dharmakañcukā ninditakāyāḥ samyakpravrajyāṃ śraddadhante|

1278:4393: ye hi kecit arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhatāṃ buddhamārgañca lipsanti|
1278:4397: dharmacakrapravartane coktam-idaṃ duḥkhamayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipaditi paśyato mama teṣu cakṣurudapadyata jñānamudapadyata vidyodapadyata bodhirudapadyata iti,
1278:4399: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre-avadātavasane hrade prakṣipte sati rūpaṃ [yathā] vedayate|
1278:4400: evamayaṃ puruṣa ekatra niṣaṇṇaścatvāri satyāni paśyati iti|
1278:4402: evaṃ paśyataḥ kāmāsravāt bhavāsravādavidyāsravāt cittaṃ vimucyate|
1278:4407: bhagavānāha catvāri jñānāni duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānamiti|
1278:4410: yathā bhiṣak rogaṃ jñātvā roganidānaṃ rogavināśaṃ rogavināśauṣadhañca jānīyāt|
1278:4411: evaṃ yogī duḥkhānāṃ nissaraṇamicchan duḥkhaṃ duḥkhanidānaṃ duḥkhanirodhaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminīṃ pratipadañca jānīyāt|
1278:4412: yadi na jānāti duḥkhaṃ kena jñāsyati duḥkhanidānaṃ duḥkhanirodhaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminīṃ pratipadañca|
1278:4415: sarvaṃ [tat] skandhadhātvāyatanādiṣūktam-yadidaṃ rūpaṃ ityādi ayaṃ rūpasya samudaya ityādi ayaṃ rūpasya vyaya ityādi prajānata āsravāḥ kṣīyanta iti|
1278:4416: kiñcāha bhagavān-rūpādīnāṃ skandhānāṃ yathābhūtamāsvādamādīnavaṃ nissaraṇaptaprajñāyānuttaraṃ mārgamaspṛśamiti na vadāmi|
1278:4418: nagaropamasūtre coktam-yadā mama na jñānamabhūt-[iti] jarāmaraṇaṃ jarāmaraṇasamudayo jarāmaraṇanirodho jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminī pratipat|
1278:4419: yāvat saṃskārāḥ saṃskārasamudayaḥ saṃskāranirodhaḥ saṃskāranirodhagāminī pratipat iti|
1278:4422: evamādi [vacanāni] dṛṣṭvā yadi [vadāmaḥ] ayameva darśanamārgādhigama iti|
1278:4428: tathā no cet nidānaṃ vaktavyaṃ-catussatyadarśanaṃ mārgādhigamakālīnaṃ pañcaskandhādidarśanaṃ sammarśanakālīnamiti|
1278:4430: pañcaskandhādīnāṃ sammarśanaṃ na kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya bhavati|
1278:4438: kecit dvādaśāyatanāni vā aṣṭādaśadhātūn vā dvādaśanidānāni vā anyāni vā paśyanto mārgamadhigacchanti iti|
1278:4439: ato jñāyate na catussatya[darśana]mātreṇa mārgādhima iti|
1278:4440: yadi bhavato mataṃ satyapyasmin vacane naitaddarśanena kleśān prajahātīti|
1278:4443: catussatyavibhaṅga uktam-jātirapi duḥkhaṃ jarāpi duḥkhaṃ vyādhirapi duḥkhaṃ maraṇamapi duḥkhaṃ vipriyasaṃyogo duḥkhaṃ priyaviyogo duḥkhaṃ yadiṣṭaṃ na labhyate tadapi duḥkhaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhamiti|
1278:4444: kiñcāha duḥkhasamudayo yeyaṃ tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī tatra tatrābhinandinī iti|
1278:4446: idaṃ sarvaṃ lokasatyaṃ na tu paramārthasatyam|
1278:4452: pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhamiti paśyataścittameva vikṣipyate na mārgo'dhigamyate|
1278:4459: ato jñāyate yogī cittata eva saṃskṛtadharme vartate na paramārthata iti|
1278:4460: yathoktaṃ sūtre-saṃskṛtadharmā anṛtā māyopamā jvālopamā svapnopamā ṛṇopamā iti|
1278:4463: asat dṛṣṭaṃ sadābhāsaṃ asadvai parayā dhiyā|| iti|
1278:4464: strī puruṣa iti dharmo yathābhūtaṃ nāsti|
1278:4465: pañcaskandhānāṃ kalāpamātre strī puruṣa iti sudṛḍhaṃ kīrtayantaḥ pṛthagjanā viparyayamugdhā vadanti|
1278:4468: yogī tu ime pañcaskandhāḥ śūnyā anātmāna iti bhāvayati|
1278:4470: yathoktaṃ dharmamudrāsūtre-yogī bhāvayati rūpamanityaṃ śūnyaṃ viyogalakṣaṇamiti|
1278:4473: śūnyamiti yathā ghaṭe jale'sati śūnyo ghaṭa iti vadanti|
1278:4474: evaṃ pañcaskandheṣu nāstyātmā ityataḥ śūnyā bhavanti|
1278:4477: ante tu nirodhaṃ paśyati yaduta yogina evaṃ bhavati yanmayā dṛṣṭaṃ śrutamityādi|
1278:4478: ato jñāyate nirodhaṃ paśyata eva kleśāḥ kṣīyanta iti|
1278:4481: nirodhalakṣaṇasākṣātkurvatastu saṃskṛteṣu duḥkhasaṃjñā na vyavasthitā bhavati|
1278:4482: yathā kasyacit prathamadhyāne prītisukhamalabdhavato na pañcakāmaguṇeṣu nirvedasaṃjñā jāyate|
1278:4483: yathā ca avitarkāvicārasamādhimalabdhvā na savitarkasavicārasamādhau doṣaṃ manyate|
1278:4485: ato jñātavyaṃ nirodhasatyaṃ paśyata eva duḥkhasaṃjñā sampannā bhavati|
1278:4495: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yogī [yat] samudayalakṣaṇaṃ tat nirodhalakṣaṇamiti prajānan suviśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣuranuprāpnoti|
1278:4498: skandhā anityā duḥkhā iti paśyannapi na nirodhamanuprāpnoti|
1278:4501: kasmāt bhagavān pudgalaḥ sukumāramatirityādi dṛṣṭvā catussatyānyudeśayati,
1278:4507: (pṛ) mārgalābhasamaya eva yadi satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ prahīyata iti|
1278:4509: (u) yogī mārgamanuprāpya dharmāḥ śūnyā anātmāna iti dṛṣṭataḥ paśyan na punarvicikitsate|
1278:4511: mārgasatyaṃ paśyan prajānāti idamekameva tattvaṃ nānyadastīti|
1278:4513: (pṛ) yadi mārgalābhakāla eva satyadarśanapraheyāḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyante|
1278:4516: yathā bhagavān bhīkṣūn pṛcchati-kena vastunā kiṃ vastūpādāya kiṃ vastvabhiniviśya īdṛśī dṛṣṭirbhavati|
1278:4517: asmin kāye mriyamāṇa eva īdṛśādayaḥ sarvā dṛṣṭayo nirudhyante|
1278:4518: bhikṣava āhuḥ-bhagavanmūlā hi no bhagavan dharmāḥ|
1278:4520: bhagavānāha-rūpe khalu sati rūpamupādāya rūpamabhiniviśya saktāyadṛṣṭirbhavati|
1278:4522: ato jñātavyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭimupādāya sarve kleśāḥ sambhavantīti|
1278:4524: satyāṃ hi satkāyadṛṣṭau vadanti-ayamātmā nityo vā'nityo veti|
1278:4545: dharmalakṣaṇaṃ sākṣātkurvato yogino na vicikitsā bhavati|
1278:4551: śīlavratasamucchedāt mārgaṃ prayujya jñāne jñeyadharmeṣu ca na vicikitsate|
1278:4553: sa eva samudayaṃ prahāya nirodhamadhigacchan catussatyasampanna ityucyate|
1278:4554: ata eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ vacanameva nirvicikitsālakṣaṇaṃ pradarśayati|
1278:4556: yathoktaṃ sūtre-ādyābhisambodhilakṣaṇaṃ yaduta dharmaṃ paśyati dharmaṃ pratilabhate dharmaṃ prajānāti dharmaṃ pratisaṃvedayate|
1278:4558: bhagavacchāsane ca vaiśāradyabalamanuprāpya phale supratitiṣṭhati| iti||
1278:4564: āyataneṣu dhātuṣu cokteṣu padārthā ālambanāni viṣayā jñeyā ityādayaḥ sarve dharmā bhavanti|
1278:4573: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi sūtre-dvābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāṃ vijñānamutpadyata iti|
1278:4582: kiñcit ṣaṣṭhasya vijñānasya svakalāpe sarvathā asadālambanaṃ bhavati|
1278:4595: na vastutaḥ sparśasya ṣaḍāyatanāni pratyayā bhavanti|
1278:4598: evaṃ caturaḥ pratyayān pratiṣidhyāha bhagavān dve āyatane iti|
1278:4602: (pṛ) anenaiva hetunā atītānāgatādayoḥ dharmāḥ santaḥ syuḥ|
1278:4613: yo dharma utpadya niruddhaḥ sa smaraṇīyaḥ|
1278:4615: kiṃ smaryeta yathā dharmaḥ pūrvaṃ sattvākhya idānīmatīto'pi sattvākhyaḥ|
1278:4616: evaṃ tasmin dharme pūrvaṃ smṛtyutpādāt tadeva cittaṃ punaḥ smaryate|
1278:4619: tasmin dharme niruddhe'pi tatsaṃjñānusmaraṇamutpādya [taṃ dharmaṃ] vikalpayati|
1278:4620: yo dharmastasya citte jāyate sa dharmo vinaṣṭaḥ|
1278:4621: paścāt [ta]nmanovijñānaṃ tat vastu vijānāti ida[meva] nimittālambanaṃ vijñānamityākhyayate|
1278:4633: yathā āryā anāgataṃ vastu jñātvā vadanti-idaṃ vastu tathā syāt,
1278:4635: (u) āryajñānabalaṃ hi tathā dharmamasantamapi prāk prajānāti|
1278:4636: yathā āryāḥ pāṣaṇabhittiṃ bhittvā apratihatamunmajjanti nimajjanti ca|
1278:4639: yathā cakṣurvijñānaṃ na strīti puruṣa iti vā vikalpayati|
1278:4646: yathā devadatta iti vacane naikaṃ vijñānaṃ catvāryakṣarāṇi vijānāti|
1278:4650: yathā ca puruṣasya svarūpaṃ naikakṣaṇena parijñeyamam|
1278:4654: bhavānavādīḥ-dṛṣṭāntaṃ pratītya nāsti kiñcit svātmālambanaṃ jñānamiti|
1278:4656: yogī cittavipaśyanāmanusarati atīte'nāgate tu cittaṃ nāsti iti vacanāt|
1278:4658: no cet na jātu kaścitpratyutpannacittasamprayukta dharmaṃ vijānāti|
1278:4660: sarve dharmā anātmānaḥ prajñayā yadi paśyati|
1278:4661: atha nirvindate duḥkhe eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye|| iti|
1278:4662: iyaṃ prajñā ātmānaṃ sahabhūdharmānanyāni sarvadharmālambanāni cāpanayati|
1278:4666: tasyāṃ hi gāthāyāmuktam-atha nirvindate duḥkha iti|
1278:4684: uktañca sūtre-yatkiñcit [bhikṣavo] rūpamatītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannamādhyātmikaṃ vā bahirdhā vā audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā [hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā] yaddūre'ntike vā sarvaṃ jānāti nātmā nātmīyamiti|
1278:4685: evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā paśyati iti|
1278:4690: rūpamanityaṃ tucchaṃ māyāvat bālālāpanaṃ vadhakaṃ steyakamanātmā anātmīyamiti|

1278:5701: trividhāvalokanajñānaṃ yaduta saṃskārā anityā duḥkhā anātmāna iti|
1278:5702: skandhadhātvāyatanamukhena saṃskārān paśyato nāstyartho hitaṃ vā|
1278:5703: (pṛ) tathā cet pūrvamādīnava uktameva-anityā duḥkhā iti|
1278:5708: pūrvaṃ śrutamayyāṃ cintāmayyāṃ prajñāyāmuktāḥ sapta prakārāḥ|
1278:5711: yadanityaṃ tat duḥkhamiti lakṣaṇasya bhaṅgo nāma anityasya bhaṅgaḥ nānityasaṃskārāṇāṃ bhaṅgaḥ|
1278:5718: (pṛ) yogino'pi buddhe dharme saṅghe śīladiṣu kṣāntirasti|
1278:5724: pūrvaṃ hi mārgānukūlāṃ cintāmayīṃ prajñāṃ prayujya paścātpratyakṣajñānamanuprāpnoti|
1278:5725: yathā hastipakaḥ pūrvaṃ hastipadaṃ dṛṣṭvā tena jñānena prajānāti-atra vartata iti|
1278:5727: tathā yogyapi pūrvaṃ kṣāntyā'nvayajñāne na nirvāṇamabhyūhya paścāt tena jñānenābhimukhīkaroti|
1278:5728: ataḥ sūtra uktam-[evaṃ] jānan[evaṃ] paśyan āsravakṣayamanuprāpnotīti||
1278:5731: (pṛ) kecidābhidharmikā vadanti arhan kṣayajñānaṃ sākṣātkurvan sāṃvṛtāni nava jñānāni prāpnoti yaduta kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalamavyākṛtaṃ [jñānaṃ] yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanapratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalamavyākṛtaṃ [jñāna]m|
1278:5742: (pṛ) yo vītarāgaḥ san na prathamadhyānasamāpattiṃ nādyāpi pratyakṣīkṛtavān|
1278:5746: (pṛ) yadi rāgādvirajyamānasyātītānāgatāni sarvāṇi dhyānāni mūlataḥ prāpnāni|
1278:5748: (u) anāgataṃ karma akṛtamabhūtaṃ na vipākaṃ prāpayati|
1278:5749: atītāni dhyānāni citta utpannacarāṇi yadi vipākaṃ prayacchanti|
1278:5762: tadā'nāgate'dhvani samy dṛṣṭiṃ prāpnoti kaścidārūpyasamādhiṃ niśrityārhatphalaṃ prāpnoti|
1278:5763: ayamanāgate samyaksaṅkalpaṃ samyagvācaṃ samyakkarmāntaṃ samyagājīvaṃ prāpnoti|
1278:5768: yadi ca nāsti anāgata [dharmaḥ] kathaṃ bhāvako phalāni dhyānasamādhyādīnanuprāpsyati|
1278:5771: tathā no cet phalāni gaṇayitvā gaṇayitvā'nuprāpnuyāt|
1278:5782: yathā manuṣyajātiḥ prāptetyato manuṣyalakṣaṇaṃ prāptaṃ bhavati|
1278:5785: (pṛ) yogino vidyamānaduḥkhādīnāṃ jñānāni kramikāṇīti sarvaṃ parihṛtameva|
1278:5789: tadā prāptiḥ prayoga iti nāsti bhedaḥ|
1278:5798: yathā samāpattapañcaśīlaḥ punaḥ pravrajyāsaṃvaramanuprāpnuvannapi na maulikaśīlebhyaḥ parihīyate|
1278:5800: yathā kaścidādau vastu jānannapi viśiṣṭavastu[darśanāya yatata] iti pravibhāgo'sti|
1278:5806: (pṛ) imāni laukikajñānāni kṣayajñānena sahārhataḥ samādhisamāpattivyutthānacittakriyāṃ prāpayanti|
1278:5810: tathā no cet na navajñānāni prāpnuyāt|
1278:5811: uktañca-anāgatabhāvanāyā nāsti hetuḥ pratyayo vā iti|
1278:5813: ete hi vadanti-satyadarśanamārge kevalaṃ nimittābhāsaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvayati|
1278:5820: śraddhāvibhukto darśanaprāptatvena parivartamānaḥ sarvasminnānantaryavimuktimārge na sāṃvṛtaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayati|
1278:5821: samayavimuktaḥ akopyavimuktatayā parivartamāno navānantarya[mārgeṣu] aṣṭavimokṣamārgeṣu saṃvṛtaṃ mārgaṃ na bhāvayati|
1278:5825: ato bhavān yadi vā samyagdyetuṃ brūyāt yadi vā śraddhāpayet|
1278:5827: ūṣma[gatā]diṣu sthitikāle uttamāni sarvāṇi kuśalamūlāni bhāvayati|
1278:5830: ata ūṣmagatādidharmakālāt yāvat kṣayajñānaṃ sarveṣāṃ bhāvanā bhavati|
1278:5839: yathoktaṃ sūtre-bhagavānānandamāmantryāha-asmin dharme evaṃ jñānena dṛṣṭvā evaṃ pratibudhyasva|
1278:5845: kiñcāha-pratyutpannāḥ kāmā anāgatāḥ kāmāśca mārasenā māradheyā mārabandhanā ityādau sarvatrocyate pratyutpannavādaḥ|
1278:5858: dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ paracittajñānaṃ duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānañca sarvaṃ sāsravamanāsravamasti|
1278:5859: imāni jñānāni ūṣmagatādidharmeṣu sāsravāṇi niyāmāvakrāntiprāpyāṇi anāsravāṇi|
1278:5860: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ-kāma [sampratiyukteṣu] saṃskāreṣu [yadanāsravaṃ] jñānaṃ [kāmasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ] hetau [yadanāsravaṃ] jñānaṃ [kāmasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ] nirodhe [yadanāsravaṃ] jñānaṃ [kāmasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ] prahāṇāya mārge [yadanāsravaṃ] jñānam,
1278:5862: rūpārūpyasampratiyukteṣu saṃskāreṣu yadanāsravaṃ jñānaṃ rūpārūpyasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ hetau yadanāsravaṃ jñānaṃ rūpārūpyasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nirodhe yadanāsravaṃ jñānaṃ rūpārūpyasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇāya mārge yadanāsravaṃ jñānam,
1278:5873: pratyakṣamālokya ca janma duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaṃ tathātītamapīti viddhi|
1278:5874: yathā ca tat duḥkhamidañca duḥkhaṃ tathānāgatamapyavehi|
1278:5875: [bījasvabhāvo hi yatheha dṛṣṭo bhūto'pi bhavyo'pi tathānumeyaḥ|]
1278:5876: patyakṣataśca jvalano yathoṣṇo bhūto'pi bhavyo'pi tathoṣṇa eva|| iti|
1278:5881: yogī hi atīte'nāgāmini pratyutpanne ca duḥkhe nirvidyate|
1278:5892: tadarthameva ābhidharmikā āhuḥ-asti prāptiraprāptirityato'nupūrveṇa satyaṃ paśyatīti|
1278:5895: ata ekasmin samaya ubhayajñānaṃ na sambhavati|
1278:5904: yogī anityaṃ duḥkhamiti paśyan śūnyamanātmeti paśyati|
1278:5911: yathoktam-adhyātmavimuktatvāt tṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣaye nirodhe svata evārhan prāpta ityucyate|
1278:5913: (pṛ) nanu sūtre kiṃ noktaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇaṃ prahāṇalakṣaṇamiti|
1278:5914: (u) ayaṃ yogī adhyātmanirodhaṃ sākṣātkṛrvan sarvatra nirviṇṇaḥ|
1278:5921: (u) evaṃ darśane sati skandhānāmanityatādidoṣamapi dṛṣṭvā duḥkhanātmasaṃjñāṃ janayati|
1278:5927: ātmana utpādo vyayaḥ syādityato jñāyate anātmeti|
1278:5932: evaṃ yoginaḥ samyak anityamanātma ca bhāvayataḥ kāyacittamupaśāmyati|
1278:5933: sarvasaṃskāreṣu samutpanneṣu teṣāṃ vihiṃsāmanubhavato duḥkhasaṃjñā samutpadyate|
1278:5936: mūḍhastu ātmasaṃjñāvaśātsatyapi mahati duḥkhe na tadupāyāsamanubhavati|
1278:5946: yathoktaṃ sūtre-abhūtanimittamidamabhūtaṃ saṃjñāmātramiti prajānato duḥkhāni kṣīyanta iti|
1278:5950: yathoktaṃ sūtre-kaścidarhan tathāgatasya purato vyākaroti-bhagavatā deśitāni na santi mama|
1278:5952: sadā mama samāhitaikāgrasya samyak caryāmanusmarataḥ kāmādīnyakuśalāni na cittasyāsravā bhavanti iti|
1278:5957: yathā sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā ayaṃ puruṣa iti saṃśerate|
1278:5959: sadā animittavihāricittatvāt pūrvaṃ sattvaśūnyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā pañcasu skandheṣu na paśyatyātmānam|
1278:5971: yathā kaścit tatra tatra pratibaddha ekasmānmukto'pi na vimukta ityucyate|
1278:5979: kṛtaṃ karaṇīyamiti karaṇīyāni sarvāṇi kṛtvā prajānāti-asmādbhavāt nāsti bhavāntaramiti|
1278:5980: ato jñāyate arhanneva sarveṣu karaṇīyeṣu vaśitāṃ prāptaḥ kṣayajñānenānutpādajñānena ca samanvitaḥ syāt,
1278:5985: jitvā mṛtyorhi senāñca viharāmi anāsravaḥ|| iti|
1278:5993: (u) yo jinauraso jānāti dharmāḥ pratītyasamutpannā iti|
1278:6001: (pṛ) sūtra uktam-catuścattvāriṃśat jñānāni yaduta jarāmaraṇe jñānaṃ,
1278:6012: yathoktaṃ sūtre-[tadyathā] nagarasvāmī nagare niṣaṇṇaḥ syāt|
1278:6013: [tatra] kiñcit dūtayugamekasmāt dvārādāgatyopasṛtya nagarasvāmino yathābhūtaṃ vacanaṃ niryātya [yathāgatamārgaṃ] pratipadyeta|
1278:6020: dūtā nānādvārebhya āgatā api ekameva sthānamupasarpanti|
1278:6022: yathā rāhula ekānte niṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ cintayan evaṃ prajānāti-īdṛśo dharma parikīrtitaṃ nirvāṇaṃ prati anuprayātīti|
1278:6023: kiñca bhagavān dharmasyāniśaṃsāyāmāha-dharmo'yaṃ sarvān kleśāgnīna nirodhayatīti nirodha ityucyate|
1278:6031: ato jñāyate pañcaskandhādayo dvārāṇi nirvāṇaparāyaṇāni bhavanti|
1278:6040: (pṛ) ucyate ca jarāmaraṇasamudayaḥ jarāmaraṇanirodho jarāmaraṇanirodhamārga ityādi|
1278:6061: tatra kasmānnoktaṃ-jarāmaraṇasya svabhāvo nirodho mārga ityādi|
1278:6064: tīrthikā bahavo nidāne bhrāntā vadanti-laukikānāṃ padārthānāṃ heturlokātmaka ityādi|
1278:6075: (u) pratyutpannamatītādhvanaḥ kadācidbhinnadharma bhavati yadutātītānāṃ sattvānāmāyurapramāṇaṃ prabhāvaśca devatulya ityevamādi|
1278:6076: āyurādi bhinnaṃ jarāmaraṇapratyayo'pi bhinno bhavediti janā vadeyuriti bhītyā niyama ucyate|
1278:6084: kasmāt tatra rūpasya svarūpaṃ nirodhaḥ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya ca svarūpaṃ nirodhaḥ|
1278:6086: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yo bhikṣavaḥ saptabhiḥ sthānopāyaiḥ tribhirvipaśyanārthaiśca samanvitaḥ sa kṣipramāsravāṇāṃ kṣayamanuprāpnoti|
1278:6088: ityādi nidānajñānāni apramāṇaśatasahasrāṇi santi yaduta cakṣurvijñānamityādi|
1278:6102: kāmarāgasya mithyāvitarkaḥ pratyayaḥ ityevamādipratyayānāṃ jñānamapramāṇamanavadhi svayamevonnetavyam||
